sections.title: We believe that community is essential for wellbeing. Blivande is here for you, a place to work, create and connect.

text.content:
Are you wondering how to make a difference? Join us at Blivande to make visors and medical gowns for health care professionals fighting COVID-19. Regular people wanting to make a difference are working in shifts. Sign up or just show up if you are without any symptoms.

Where: Södra Hamnvägen 9, Stockholm
When: 09:00 to 21:00, every day
For updates, join the group on Facebook

sections.title: Always Becoming
sections.text1: House Blivande is a community for work, creativity and participatory culture in Stockholm. Our 40 to 60 members have access to offices, meeting rooms, workshops, a library, communal spaces, a wood workshop, sewing machines, an electronics lab, micromanufacturing, a metal workshop and a community to call their own.
sections.text2: Our house in the harbor is the foundation for a network of organizations, groups and initiatives. We believe that by sharing our resources, we can all afford to be more generous. To make space for experiments we opened Frihamnstorget, a parking lot transformed into a public square surrounded by colorful containers. We strive to create an environment for arts, crafts, inventions and gatherings. It's a canvas open to your initiative.

text.content: Our participatory workspace Studio Beta is an office at the heart of a community. We welcome new members to join us.
Tau is an art space, maker space and community space fostering creation in an intimate and supportive environment, driven by the ethos of participatory culture.

Blivande is one of the most unique event spaces in Stockholm. We can host parties, conferences, private gatherings, club nights or concerts. We have excellent audio and visual equipment and can take care of booking great DJs and entertainers.

Noden is a radical experiment in community building. What unites the activities taking place is that they are all created with the intention of bringing people together, ideally contributing towards reinforcing a sense of purpose and meaning in our everyday lives.

Working together in a big community means that we can achieve more together. Since we are not all in the house at the same time, our online forum is a very important part of how we co-create. Our online community is open to everyone. Go ahead, explore a few stories we've picked from the forum.

Edgeryders is a platform of over 5.000 people who have been sharing their stories, their ideas, their problems, and their solutions since 2013. All these posts together are what we call our 'collective intelligence'. Blivande is connected to the Edgeryders network and many of our members are also contributors to Edgeryders projects.
